short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a password in a moments notice!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.0 features: 

-Personalized Passwords: PassGen allows users to generate a custom passwords tailored to you preferences and requirements such as length and special characters needed. Since most strong passwords these days require case-different letters and numbers these settings are default!

-Length feature to change the length of your generated password

-Special character feature which lets you choose what special characters you would like to make use of! If left blank then a default set of special characters will be used for maximum password security!

-User-Friendly Interface: PassGen boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it easy for anyone to generate custom passwords quickly!
